This is a good place, but I find it easier navigate on the 
sourceforge forum of Openglad. http://sourceforge.net/forum/?
group_id=50083   (less ads). 

The corrosive acid seems like and interesting weapon for slimes. And 
slimes SHOULD be able to rejoin together.
